entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UWP App Compiler Errors in x64 Release mode but not Debug mode. #67187
  • Anonymous objects are clickable inside quick info, but lead to nowehre #67185
  • Language Injection : Syntax highlighting and Intellisense support for languages or formats contained in string. #67182
  • VS 2022 spell checker is considering c# keywords as spelling error #67181
  • Inconsistent indenting displaying for XML doc comments between base member and derived (impl'ed) member #67180

Closed

  • 'Convert typeof to nameof' has bug with nint and nuint #47128
  • SolutionAssetStorage.GetAssetAsync should never return null #47013
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow generating local variable in expression body #67186
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic snippets - `enum` snippet #67184
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [DO NOT MERGE] [VALIDATION] enable pull diagnostic #67179
    Area-IDE
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Fix issue with 'convert typeof(x) to nameof(x)' with 'nint' #67151
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Force solution-asset system to fail if it can't find an asset for a checksum #67149
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Primary Constructors - Don't report unused parameters #67167
    Area-IDE
  • Hoist address-of operators across await boundaries #66915
    Area-Compilers
